description:
Luffy hopes to send a message to his mates by way of a clue hidden in a newspaper article. Meanwhile, the Flying Fish Riders protect the Straw Hat`s ship from scandalous scavengers!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nakama ni Todoke: Kakemeguru Dai News!
Une nouvelle qui fait grand bruit ! L`équipage se tient au courant
With Hopes It Will Reach My Friends! Big News Spreading Fast!
Достигни друзей! Грандиозные вести расходятся повсюду!
仲間に届け かけめぐる大ニュース!
